page.title: 03COASTLINE- SW.BOGNOR REGIS
page.content: People are attracted to this area because of the{sea}and the{sea-shore. The beach at{high tide}is{pebble}but at{low tide}there is an expanse of {golden sand.}The pebbles were moved here as a sea-defence about 10 years ago.Further along the coast behind the beach huts is a{tamarisk hedge}which protected the fields from the sea many hundreds of years ago.The{shelving}is quite gentle so the sea is safe for non-swimmers and young children. {Bognor Rocks}which can be a danger to boats are situated to the west of this area. At this point, known as{Gray's {beach,}there are about 117{beach huts. Some are used by fishermen ,as they were many years ago ,but others are used by holiday makers.Along the coast you will find{cafes,amusements, water {sports}and{deck chairs.}You can also find a variety of{sea-shore life.
